title: Dueling Piano Nights
description:
Every Friday and Saturday, The Padre Hotel and 2 Grand Entertainment presents Dueling Pianos at Prospect Lounge! This request driven event encourages the audience shout out their favorite songs as two piano players and singers perform face to face on the stage. So grab a drink and sing or dance along! Pair a Meal with Your Music - $38 for 16oz Prime Rib or $32 for 12oz Prime Rib. All served with baked potato and seasonal vegetable. Book your reservation today.


21+
Arrive early to secure your spot - seating is limited, standing room only after seats are filled
short_description: Every Friday and Saturday, The Padre Hotel and 2 Grand Entertainment presents Dueling Pianos at Prospect Lounge!
